item.description: This site is a fun joke based around my coworker’s use of Broadcast Storm to stand in for Bullshit. It’s the ultimate stand-in for emails, IMs, text messages, meeting titles, and more if you even tangentially have anything to do with networking. Now you also know the arcane secrets of attaining catharsis by throwing shade at people publicly on your calendar without them realizing it! Take the small victories where you can get them.
